item.title: Coded my own thieveing, 1 little error
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:35, topic:181328”][quote author=wasabiie link=topic=242824.msg2052635#msg2052635 date=1202988083]
Stop changing the subject, what are you…10?

And ho teaches with cancer in the first place? what is your school consist of? a bunch of hicks?

Sorry, but it seems you arnt well liked around here.
[/quote]

oh no he insulted a cancer patient, now hes a jackass…how do the circumstances change whenever someone has a certain illness. heartbreaking…yes. but unless it actually effects the way someone thinks, their teaching skills can be criticized w/o feeling guilty.

+1

Umm its a she and she has cancer… stage 1 or w.e its called

I don’t really remember saying she was a he.
I don’t care if she has cancer. Yes, it’s not good, but I am insulting her as a teacher[/quote]

I was just stating a fact I don’t care if you insulted her…
and bug I just got told about 4 stories about you in a pm on how you are a leecher…

Read full topic

item.title: Coded my own thieveing, 1 little error
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

If Any1 Want To Know Skill Numbers…

int Attacklvl = p2.playerLevel[0];
int Strengthlvl = p2.playerLevel[2];
int Defencelvl = p2.playerLevel[1];
int Hitpointslvl = p2.playerLevel[3];
int Prayerlvl = p2.playerLevel[5];
int Magiclvl = p2.playerLevel[6];
int Rangelvl = p2.playerLevel[4];
int Runecraftlvl = p2.playerLevel[20];
int Herblorelvl = p2.playerLevel[15];
int Theivinglvl = p2.playerLevel[17];
int Agilitylvl = p2.playerLevel[16];
int Craftinglvl = p2.playerLevel[12];
int Fletchinglvl = p2.playerLevel[9];
int Slayerlvl = p2.playerLevel[18];
int Mininglvl = p2.playerLevel[14];
int Smithinglvl = p2.playerLevel[13];
int Fishinglvl = p2.playerLevel[10];
int Cookinglvl = p2.playerLevel[7];
int Firemakinglvl = p2.playerLevel[11];
int Woodcuttinglvl = p2.playerLevel[8];
int Farming = p2.playerLevel[19];

item.title: Coded my own thieveing, 1 little error
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

did you read anything else i put?

But A N Y W A Y S. I’l ltry those, thank you.

[code]public void TheifStall2(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
theifTimer = delay;
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}
}[/code]

lvlreq was already in my meathod.

Read full topic
